languages.text: "Малохольные черви, много смелости, раз испытываете мое терпение!? А ну подать мне эттфатера сюда — спустится вниз, не развалится!" {n}Голос Ульфара подобен громовому раскату — кажется, сами стены содрогаются от могучего эха.{/n}
languages.translation_comment: пусть будет последним в списке интераптов, чтобы сразу за ним шло описание реакта стражников

traits.locale_text: [draft] "Как смеете вы дерзить мне, черви кишечные? Не пустите к эттфатер — изрублю и по вашим потрохам пройду!" {n}Голос Ульфара подобен громовому раскату — кажется, сами стены содрогаются от могучего эха.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.translation_comment: пусть будет последним в списке интераптов, чтобы сразу за ним шло описание реакта стражников

languages.text: "Feeble worms! Do you feel brave, testing my patience so? Present the Aett-Vater! Go on, make {rt_mf|him|her} come down here — it is a short enough trip!" {n}Ulfar's voice is like a thunderclap, the walls themselves seeming to shake with its mighty echo.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Малохольные черви, много смелости, раз испытываете мое терпение!? А ну подать мне эттфатера сюда — спустится вниз, не развалится!" {n}Голос Ульфара подобен громовому раскату — кажется, сами стены содрогаются от могучего эха.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Feeble worms! Do you feel brave, testing my patience so? Present the Aett-Vater! Go on, make {rt_mf|him|her} come down here — it is a short enough trip!" {n}Ulfar's voice is like a thunderclap, the walls themselves seeming to shake with its mighty echo.{/n}

"Feeble worms! Do you feel brave, testing my patience so? Present the Aett-Vater! Go on, make {rt_mf|him|her} come down here — it is a short enough trip!" {n}Ulfar's voice is like a thunderclap, the walls themselves seeming to shake with its mighty echo.{/n}
"You dare test my patience, feeble worms? Present the Aett-Vater!" {n}Ulfar's voice is like a thunderclap, the walls themselves seeming to shake with its mighty echo.{/n}

"Feeble worms! Do you feel brave, testing my patience so? Present the Aett-Vater! Go on, make {rt_mf|him|her} come down here — it is a short enough trip!" {n}Ulfar's voice is like a thunderclap, the walls themselves seeming to shake with its mighty echo.{/n}

"Feeble worms! Do you feel brave, testing my patience so? Present the Aett-Vater! Go on, make {rt_mf|him|her} come down here — it is a short enough trip!" {n}Ulfar's voice is like a thunderclap, the walls themselves seeming to shake with its mighty echo.{/n}

languages.text: “你们这些蛆虫！你们哪来的胆子，竟敢考验我的耐心？把狼领带过来！别磨蹭，赶紧把{rt_mf|他|她}带过来！这地方没多大！”{n}乌尔法的怒吼仿佛惊雷一般，就连墙壁都震颤起来。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Feeble worms! Do you feel brave, testing my patience so? Present the Aett-Vater! Go on, make {rt_mf|him|her} come down here — it is a short enough trip!" {n}Ulfar's voice is like a thunderclap, the walls themselves seeming to shake with its mighty echo.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “你们这些蛆虫！你们哪来的胆子，竟敢考验我的耐心？把狼领带过来！别磨蹭，赶紧把{rt_mf|他|她}带过来！这地方没多大！”{n}乌尔法的怒吼仿佛惊雷一般，就连墙壁都震颤起来。{/n}

languages.text: «¿Osáis poner a prueba mi paciencia, gusanos escuchimizados? ¡Traedme {rt_mf|al|a la} Aett-Vater! Haced que baje, ¡no está tan lejos!». {n}La voz de Ulfar retumba como un trueno, y su poderoso eco parece sacudir las mismas paredes.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Feeble worms! Do you feel brave, testing my patience so? Present the Aett-Vater! Go on, make {rt_mf|him|her} come down here — it is a short enough trip!" {n}Ulfar's voice is like a thunderclap, the walls themselves seeming to shake with its mighty echo.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¿Osáis poner a prueba mi paciencia, gusanos escuchimizados? ¡Traedme {rt_mf|al|a la} Aett-Vater! Haced que baje, ¡no está tan lejos!». {n}La voz de Ulfar retumba como un trueno, y su poderoso eco parece sacudir las mismas paredes.{/n}

languages.text: "Zavallı solucanlar! Yüreklendiniz de sabrımı mı sınıyorsunuz? Aett-Vater'ı getirin! Zaten yakında, hemen getirin onu!" {n}Ulfar, gök misali gürlüyor. Duvarlar bile sesinin kudretli yankısıyla titriyormuş gibi görünüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Feeble worms! Do you feel brave, testing my patience so? Present the Aett-Vater! Go on, make {rt_mf|him|her} come down here — it is a short enough trip!" {n}Ulfar's voice is like a thunderclap, the walls themselves seeming to shake with its mighty echo.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Zavallı solucanlar! Yüreklendiniz de sabrımı mı sınıyorsunuz? Aett-Vater'ı getirin! Zaten yakında, hemen getirin onu!" {n}Ulfar, gök misali gürlüyor. Duvarlar bile sesinin kudretli yankısıyla titriyormuş gibi görünüyor.{/n}

languages.text: 「貧弱な虫けらどもめ！俺の忍耐を試して勇敢になったつもりか？アエット＝ヴァテルを出せ！さあ、{rt_mf|彼|彼女}をここに呼べ！どうせすぐに来られるところにいるんだろう！」{n}ウルファーの声は雷鳴のように轟き、そのとてつもない響きで壁が震えているかのように見えた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Feeble worms! Do you feel brave, testing my patience so? Present the Aett-Vater! Go on, make {rt_mf|him|her} come down here — it is a short enough trip!" {n}Ulfar's voice is like a thunderclap, the walls themselves seeming to shake with its mighty echo.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「貧弱な虫けらどもめ！俺の忍耐を試して勇敢になったつもりか？アエット＝ヴァテルを出せ！さあ、{rt_mf|彼|彼女}をここに呼べ！どうせすぐに来られるところにいるんだろう！」{n}ウルファーの声は雷鳴のように轟き、そのとてつもない響きで壁が震えているかのように見えた。{/n}

languages.text: « Immondes vers de terre ! Pour qui vous prenez-vous, en mettant ma patience à l'épreuve ? Rendez-nous l'aett-vater ! Allez, {rt_mf|faites-le|faites-la} descendre ! Cela ne devrait pas vous prendre trop longtemps ! »{n}La voix d'Ulfar résonne comme un coup de tonnerre, dont l'écho puissant fait trembler jusqu'aux murs eux-mêmes.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Feeble worms! Do you feel brave, testing my patience so? Present the Aett-Vater! Go on, make {rt_mf|him|her} come down here — it is a short enough trip!" {n}Ulfar's voice is like a thunderclap, the walls themselves seeming to shake with its mighty echo.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Immondes vers de terre ! Pour qui vous prenez-vous, en mettant ma patience à l'épreuve ? Rendez-nous l'aett-vater ! Allez, {rt_mf|faites-le|faites-la} descendre ! Cela ne devrait pas vous prendre trop longtemps ! »{n}La voix d'Ulfar résonne comme un coup de tonnerre, dont l'écho puissant fait trembler jusqu'aux murs eux-mêmes.{/n}

languages.text: "Schwache Würmer! Denkt Ihr, es ist mutig, meine Geduld derart auf die Probe zu stellen?" Verneigt Euch vor dem Aett-Vater! Nur zu, lasst {rt_mf|ihn|sie} herkommen ... es ist schließlich nicht weit!" {n}Ulfars Stimme gleicht einem Donnerschlag. Die Wände selbst scheinen ob des gewaltigen Echos zu beben.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Feeble worms! Do you feel brave, testing my patience so? Present the Aett-Vater! Go on, make {rt_mf|him|her} come down here — it is a short enough trip!" {n}Ulfar's voice is like a thunderclap, the walls themselves seeming to shake with its mighty echo.{/n}
